props.name: aria-label
props.description: The label of the slider

props.name: aria-labelledby
props.description: The id of the element containing a label for the slider

props.name: aria-valuetext
props.description: A string value that provides a user-friendly name for the current value of the slider

props.name: color
props.description: The color of the component

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the component will be disabled

props.name: disableSwap
props.description: If true, the active thumb doesn't swap when moving pointer over a thumb while dragging another thumb

props.name: getAriaLabel
props.description: Accepts a function which returns a string value that provides a user-friendly name for the thumb labels of the slider

props.name: getAriaValueText
props.description: Accepts a function which returns a string value that provides a user-friendly name for the current value of the slider

props.name: marks
props.description: Marks indicate predetermined values to which the user can move the slider

props.name: max
props.description: The maximum allowed value of the slider

props.name: min
props.description: The minimum allowed value of the slider

props.name: name
props.description: Name attribute of the hidden input element

props.name: onChange
props.type: (event: Event, value: number | number[], activeThumb: number) => void
props.description: Callback function that is fired when the slider's value changed

props.name: onChangeCommitted
props.type: (event: React.SyntheticEvent | Event, value: number | number[]) => void
props.description: Callback function that is fired when the mouseup is triggered

props.name: orientation
props.description: The orientation of the slider

props.name: scale
props.description: A transformation function, to change the scale of the slider

props.name: size
props.description: The size of the slider

props.name: step
props.description: The granularity with which the slider can step through values

props.name: track
props.description: The track presentation

props.name: value
props.description: The value of the slider

props.name: valueLabelDisplay
props.description: Controls when the value label is displayed

props.name: valueLabelFormat
props.description: The format function the value label's value
